description: A React component named GameCanvas that wraps an HTML5 canvas element for a pixel-art style game. It manages physical pixel scaling and exposes imperative methods for game engine interaction.

methods.name: useImperativeHandle
methods.description: Exposes imperative methods getContext and getCanvas to parent components.

ctags.name: GameCanvas
ctags.pattern: /^const GameCanvas = forwardRef(({ width, height, scale = 2, onCanvasReady }, ref) => {$/
